Announcements

07 April 2023

Primary Partner—Doosan Mobility Innovation (DMI)

We are partnering with DMI, a leader in fuel cell technology for drones and small vehicles.

12 March 2023

We Have a New Home!

Check out our new space in MIT's Milkdrop shop equipped with a dynamometer, and a brand new neon sign!

11 December 2022

We got a motorcycle! And she's a beauty!

Meet 'Toothless', a 2000 Ducati 900ss track bike, and our new ride XD

10 December 2022

We are building a hydrogen powered motorcycle!

A little bit of history on the project, and some brief details :)

Licence to Fab

An MIT student team building an open-source, Hydrogen fueled power unit for vehicles to bring us towards a more carbon negative future.
